responsive radio

*hey, before you read, i encourage you to interact with the work here first! (or don't, it's okay)*

2023. Playing with the properties and bounds of the web browser, responsive radio uses the scale of the browser as a tuner for a virtual 'radio', allowing the user to listen to various audio as they adjust their browser window size. This alternative way of interaction can encourage a discovery and break from the normal uses of forms' buttons and boxes.
